column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////We decided to go to Lou's as our first stop in Chicago and we were not disappointed! The wings were amazing! We went with BBQ per our server
column3: recommendation and loved them. We decided to get both a small deep dish and small thin crust and enjoyed both! I preferred the thin crust because you got to taste more of the buttery
column4: flaky crust. Service was very good and no wait at all on a Friday at lunch time. Highly recommended for travelers!
